thesongstress:Abolish.NAME: Abolish
thesongstress:Abolish.DESCRIPTION: Deal !B! damage. Deal !D! damage to all enemies. Lose all Holy. Lose 3 Strength and Dexterity. NL Exhaust.

thesongstress:AngelicDescent.NAME: Angelic Descent
thesongstress:AngelicDescent.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to your current Holy to all enemies X times. NL Exhaust.
thesongstress:AngelicDescent.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to your current Holy to all enemies X+1 times. NL Exhaust.

thesongstress:AngelicLuck.NAME: Angelic Luck
thesongstress:AngelicLuck.DESCRIPTION: Play and exhaust !M! random cards from your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

thesongstress:BlessedFury.NAME: Blessed Fury
thesongstress:BlessedFury.DESCRIPTION: Costs !M! Holy. Until the end of turn, whenever you play a card, play it twice. NL Exhaust.

thesongstress:DeafenedStab.NAME: Deafened Stab
thesongstress:DeafenedStab.DESCRIPTION: Can only play while Muted. Deal !D! damage.

thesongstress:DestructiveDiscord.NAME: Destructive Discord
thesongstress:DestructiveDiscord.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If the enemy is Charmed, deal !M! more damage. NL Song.

thesongstress:Diminuendo.NAME: Diminuendo
thesongstress:Diminuendo.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak to all enemies and remove their Strength. NL Exhaust.

thesongstress:Exorcism.NAME: Exorcism
thesongstress:Exorcism.DESCRIPTION: Apply 3 Vulnerable and Weak to all enemies. Gain !M! Holy.

thesongstress:Expunge.NAME: Expunge
thesongstress:Expunge.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust up to 2 cards. Take !D! damage and gain !M! Holy for each card exhausted this way. NL Exhaust.

thesongstress:FaithsQuestioning.NAME: Faith's Questioning
thesongstress:FaithsQuestioning.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. Holy and Cure cards cost 0 for this turn. NL Exhaust.

thesongstress:FaithsSaber.NAME: Faith's Saber
thesongstress:FaithsSaber.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Use 1 Holy to attack again.

thesongstress:Guidance.NAME: Guidance
thesongstress:Guidance.DESCRIPTION: On your next turn, gain X Holy and draw !M! cards.
thesongstress:Guidance.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: On your next turn, gain X+1 Holy and draw !M! cards.

thesongstress:HarmonicMelody.NAME: Harmonic Melody
thesongstress:HarmonicMelody.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply Charmed to all enemies.

thesongstress:InfiniteMelody.NAME: Infinite Melody
thesongstress:InfiniteMelody.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a Song, draw !M! card.

thesongstress:Mend.NAME: Mend
thesongstress:Mend.DESCRIPTION: Cure. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Exhaust.

thesongstress:OnMercysWings.NAME: On Mercy's Wings
thesongstress:OnMercysWings.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Holy. Take half damage until the start of your next turn.

thesongstress:PentagonalSolo.NAME: Pentagonal Solo
thesongstress:PentagonalSolo.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! Weak and !M! Vulnerable. Gain 1 Strength and 1 Dexterity. NL Song. Exhaust.

thesongstress:PowerChord.NAME: Power Chord
thesongstress:PowerChord.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Gain !M! Strength. NL Song.

thesongstress:Prayer.NAME: Prayer
thesongstress:Prayer.DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn, gain !M! Holy.

thesongstress:Purge.NAME: Purge
thesongstress:Purge.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust ALL Curses and Statuses. Gain !M! Strength for each card exhausted. NL Exhaust.

thesongstress:Revival.NAME: Revival
thesongstress:Revival.DESCRIPTION: Return up to !M! cards from Exhaust.

thesongstress:SheetMusic.NAME: Sheet Music
thesongstress:SheetMusic.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! card. Draw 1 additional card for each Song played this turn.

thesongstress:Shimmer.NAME: Shimmer
thesongstress:Shimmer.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak. Use 1 Holy to gain !B! Block.

thesongstress:SonicScreech.NAME: Sonic Screech
thesongstress:SonicScreech.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies. Gain 1 Muted.

thesongstress:SourNote.NAME: Sour Note
thesongstress:SourNote.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! Weak to all enemies. NL Song.

thesongstress:Symphony.NAME: Symphony
thesongstress:Symphony.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies for each Song in your deck. Gain 2 Muted.

thesongstress:WingBuffet.NAME: Wing Buffet
thesongstress:WingBuffet.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. Can be upgraded any number of times.
